hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Slingshot#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Try holding a D-pad button on the item screen.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
